title: 2 Bed Flat, Haley Court, HA8
description: Stunning modern south facing 2 bedroom flat  in a highly sought after Broadfields Estate in Edgware near to schools and transport links. Description:The property benefits from a good dose of sunlight all day during winter months which make it a happy, cosy and warm home. The flat was newly built on 2010 and in excellent decorative state . The owner has recently  painted the walls, ceilings and woodworks and carried out end of tenancy cleaning ready for the letting purpose.The flat is situated literally on the outskirt of London and benefit from wide open space immediately behind the building. The window overlooking the open space act as a live wallpaper mirroring seasonal view of the landscape.The flat is located on the 3rd floor of Haley Court consisting a small block of 14 flats. The flat is let unfurnished and comprises of :- a spacious living room leading on to the balcony with large windows- a fully fitted modern kitchen (Fridge/ Freezer and a brand new Washer/Drier included)- a lovely large bathroom with bath shower- a large master bedroom with two large wardrobes- a small double bedroom with a built in wardrobe/storage.- a hallway leading into all the rooms with a storage- secure entry system- an allocated parking space and visitor parking space- large communal garden with a bike shed-gas central heating with combi boilerThis is a perfect home for a professional couple or a family with kids with great facilities within the vicinity.Atlas Crescent is located off Springwood Crescent which has a direct frequent bus route to Edgware town centre, Northern Line and Jubilee line Station.  It is less than half a mile from the local shopping facilities of Glengall Road including Tesco Express.  It is in the catchment area of excellent primary and secondary schools while Broadfields Primary school is a stone’s throw away. It has easy access to parks, open spaces and places of worship. Good transport link and easy access to M1, A1, A41.

title: Room in a Shared House, Tallis Way, WD6
description: Are you a young professional relocating to, or working in Borehamwood and surrounding areas, looking for a double spacious room in a totally WOW co-living house? Do you want free parking, ultra-fast wifi, great housemates and a dedicated Netflix channel? Then look NO further! Top floor double en-suite room with lots of storage. 🛌 AVAILABLE from 28th February.£750pcm (All bills included) Don’t miss out on this fantastic opportunity to live in this, bright, spacious, beautifully furnished and decorated double en-suite room with lots of storage space, including a desk and fold up chair for working at home, double ottoman storage bed, large wardrobe, shelving unit and bedside table, plus your very own en-suite! Your en-suite bathroom is kitted out with a modern power shower, electric towel rail, mirror with light, close up vanity mirror and shaving socket and the house cleaner will even clean it once a month for you! THE HOUSEMATES: 👨🏾🤝👨🏻👩🏼🤝👩🏾All housemates are professional, friendly and easy-going and enjoy living in a modern house-share with like-minded individuals.  It is always the housemates that make a co-living work, and I am pleased to say that they really make this house a home!ECO FRIENDLY: 🌍 We are delighted to share that all our FineRooms houses are proud to have great ECO credentials. Our houses are all designed to be energy efficient with up-to-date heating and resource management. All cleaning materials and dishwasher cleaners are provided and replenished regularly and are fully environmentally friendly. Recycling is actively encouraged as are the principles of reduce, reuse and up-cycling. Collections via housemates for old and unwanted clothes are regularly donated to charities too.WHAT IS INCLUDED?🗞All Bills - Nothing Extra To Pay  🌐 High Speed Virgin Broadband🛏 Fully Furnished Rooms with Desks, Storage Space, Ottoman Bed & Memory Foam Mattresses  🚿 Weekly Cleaner for communal areas & en-suites🍳 Fully Fitted Modern kitchen with all your Essentials Included🧺 Laundry Closet with Separate Washing Machine and Dryer🛋 Open-plan Lounge-Area with Smart TV, NETFLIX Account and Corner Sofa🏞 Garden with table & chairs & BBQ 🚂 Walking Distance To Transport Links 🎁 Complimentary Eco-Friendly Welcome Pack WHAT ELSE CAN YOU EXPECT?Make your morning coffee ☕️ from a nespresso coffee machine, relax in the TV 📺 den after a hard days work or create culinary delights in the open plan, fully equipped kitchen 🍽As well as local shops nearby, the house is only a 15 minute walk or short bus ride from Borehamwood shopping area with access to centre of London via ThamesLink 🚆.For drivers 🚗, there are 2 spaces in front available on a FCFS basis and also plenty of free local parking available too. Road links are excellent with the A1, M1 and M25 all within 10 minutes drive.THE LANDLORD 🙋🏻♀️The house is owned and managed by an experienced, friendly and helpful Landlord & Lettings Manager Sarah. Laoise & Sarah respond quickly to all issues, within 24 hours🧚🏼♀️. You will get access to an exclusive app 📲 which you can use to report issues or ask any questions at any time, as well as view all your tenancy documents and notices.Contact Sarah NOW to book a viewing, lower your moving in costs, and make this fantastic house your NEW home ✨A LITTLE MORE INFO 📝£150 holding deposit required on application with balance (£500) payable prior to check-in, subject to successful referencing and contract.Short term lets (less than 6 months) are considered with +5% rent.🚫 Please NOTE that regretfully this house is not suitable for couples or pets.🚭 Smoking ONLY permitted in garden.

title: 2 Bed Flat, Todd Close, WD6
description: A bright, airy and modern 2 bedroom ground floor apartment available to rent from the 14th May onwards.The area;Located on the quiet residential development at Todd Close which is a 5-minute walk to Borehamwood high street and all of the local amenities. There are bus stops at the entrance to the development, as well as easy access to the A1 and M25. The new sky studios are within short walking distance, as is the Venue sports centre.The property;This apartment is an ideal size for a couple or family with a young child. It comes with an allocated parking space, and has a patio with direct access to a shared garden at the rear that is perfect to use on sunny days. The building and gardens are well maintained by the property management company and there is a communal roof terrace available. It has gas central heating, integrated appliances, secure double glazed windows and connections are available for high-speed broadband, telephone and satellite television. There is a good sized storage cubboard in the hallway with built in shelving. The property is furnished with a corner sofa and dining table/chairs but if they are not required they can be removed. The master bedroom has built in wardrobes, and the windows throughout have curtains, as well as privacy blinds on the patio doors.New laminate flooring and bathroom tiling is due to be fitted and will be complete prior to the start of a tenancy so please be aware when viewing the property that the existing flooring has been removed.

title: Room in a Shared House, Siskin Close, WD6
description: Are you tired of sharing dusty cramped houses? Have you had enough of queuing for that mouldy bathroom?If you are a professional with high standards, clean borderline OCD, and you want to live in a proper home with only one other housemate (;)), look no further!!Kingsize Bedroom in 2-bed house is available from mid-march.The whole house is to share only with one other professional and 3 hypoallergenic siberian cats, no competition for bathroom or kitchen use (the cats don't cook..)!The house has a spacious south facing garden (with sun-loungers, perfect to top up you tan in the summer) and a garage, good to store bikes or excess stuff! Parking available in front of the garage. The house is located in a quiet end of a cul de sac, yet very well connected: 5 min walk from the station, with direct trains to St Pancras (15-20min), Farringdon(30 min), London bridge (40 min) and St Albans/Luton (15/30 min).High street with shops, plenty of eateries, post office, groceries all within 5-10 min walk away.Rent (£800/month) includes all bills (including fibre broadband). 1 month deposit to pay on reservation of the room.LGBTQ+ welcome!Pets considered for the right person, compatibly with the existing ones.

description: Newly refurbished end terrace house based in prime location of Brownlow Road, Borehamwood available for rent. Available from 2nd May 2022. The ground floor has a nice open plan kitchen and TV / living room, as well as a ground floor en-suite bedroom. The first floor has a further two bedrooms with brand new built in wardrobesThe second floor has a third bedroom with access to storage in eaves.The South East facing rear garden benefits from an out house which could be used as a gym, home office or work studio space. Permit parking only.Walking distance to Elstree & Borehamwood stationWalking distance to Borehamwood high street with plenty of shops and restaurants
